code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Toaster}from'react-hot-toast';import{AuthProvider,useAuth}from'./contexts/AuthContext';import{ThemeProvider}from'./contexts/ThemeContext';import LoginForm from'./components/Auth/LoginForm';import RegisterForm from'./components/Auth/RegisterForm';import Sidebar from'./components/Sidebar/Sidebar';import ChatWindow from'./components/Chat/ChatWindow';import'./styles/global.css';import'./styles/variables.css';import'./styles/animations.css';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthPage=()=>{const[isLogin,setIsLogin]=useState(true);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-container",children:isLogin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{onSwitchToRegister:()=>setIsLogin(false)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterForm,{onSwitchToLogin:()=>setIsLogin(true)})});};const MainApp=()=>{const{isAuthenticated,isLoading}=useAuth();const[currentRoom,setCurrentRoom]=useState(null);const[sidebarOpen,setSidebarOpen]=useState(false);if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner large"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading ChatFlow..."})]});}if(!isAuthenticated){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthPage,{});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{currentRoom:currentRoom,onRoomChange:setCurrentRoom}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatWindow,{room:currentRoom,onToggleSidebar:()=>setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen)})]});};function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThemeProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(AuthProvider,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainApp,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Toaster,{position:"top-right",toastOptions:{duration:3000,style:{background:'var(--bg-secondary)',color:'var(--text-primary)',border:'1px solid var(--glass-border)',borderRadius:'var(--radius-lg)'}}})]})});}export default App;
